text: After the nested - PCR amplification , 5 μL reaction mixtures was subjected to electrophoresis on a 2 % agarose gel containing 0 . 5 μg ethidium bromide per mL . The positive products were gel purified for DNA sequencing using the QIAquick Gel Extraction Kit ( Qiagen ) according to the manufacturer ' s instructions . DNA sequencing was performed using the Cycle Sequencing Kit ( Qiagen ) on a DNA analyser .
